name: Mikuni Field Combat
summary: This is a shooting game that combines futuristic weapons with the worldview of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms, and has been well-received since its release as an app for NTT DoCoMo in May of this year, so it has now been ported to Yahoo! Mobile. The game adopts the Capture Beam system from Field Combat, which was released in 1985 for arcades and the Family Computer, and tells the story of how players must use a variety of weapons and tactics to survive the chaotic battles of mainland China in an innovative worldview and system. This game is recommended not only for those who have enjoyed Field Combat in the arcade or Family Computer versions, but also for fans of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms and those who have never played before. Please enjoy the unique system and the charm of the characters.
